message.body: $TSLA TESLA: TO ESCAPE CUSTOMS DUTIES, ITS MODELS SOON PRODUCED IN CHINA https://theqtimes.com/tesla-to-escape-customs-duties-its-models-soon-produced-in-china-2/15167

links.title: Tesla: to escape customs duties, its models soon produced in China
links.description: With a turnover in excess of $ 1 billion and a strategic agreement with Tencent Holding, the Chinese giant of new technologies, Tesla seems to have all the cards in hand for the construction of its first factory in China . A contract between the municipality of Shanghai and the Californian brand has recently been finalized.

$TSLA https://cleantechnica.com/2017/03/01/china-will-replace-67000-fossil-fueled-taxis-beijing-electric-cars/

links.title: China Will Replace All 67,000 Fossil-Fueled Taxis In Beijing With Electric Cars
links.description: Originally published on . Taxis are the bane of all urban areas. Typically, they are poorly made, poorly maintained, and spew tons of carbon dioxide into the air every day as they shuttle people from place to place. Beijing has nearly 70,000 taxis. It also has an intractable problem with smog.
